description: This Dart source file defines the GameController class responsible for managing the game flow of a Tic-Tac-Toe game. It handles starting new games, making moves, implementing simple AI logic for move selection, and evaluating game state. It interacts with models imported from 'game_models.dart' and notifies listeners upon state changes.

classes.name: GameController
classes.description: Controls game flow, applies moves, and contains simple AI for the Tic-Tac-Toe game.

classes.name: _BoardEvaluation
classes.description: Helper class to encapsulate the result of evaluating the game board, including game status and winning line.

methods.name: newGame
methods.description: Starts a new game with the selected game mode.

methods.name: restart
methods.description: Restarts the current game while maintaining the current game mode.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Attempts to place a mark on the board at a specified index, updates the game state, and triggers AI move if applicable.

methods.name: _aiMove
methods.description: Performs a simple AI move based on winning, blocking, and strategic positions.

methods.name: _findWinningMove
methods.description: Helper method to identify a winning move for a given mark on the board.

methods.name: _evaluateBoard
methods.description: Evaluates the current board to determine if there's a winner, a tie, or if the game should continue.
